# sectionIndexTitle

**Instance Property**

The section’s index title.

## Declaration

```swift
var sectionIndexTitle: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

The system displays only the first character of the section index title.

## Getting Supplementary Information

- **header**: The section’s header text.
